Hero.title: From Concept to Launch,
Hero.subtitle: Transparent & Professional
Hero.description: Explore my 5-step workflow designed to deliver high-quality results on Upwork. No surprises, just clear milestones and consistent communication.

Steps.title: My 5-Step Workflow
Steps.subtitle: A structured approach to ensure your project's success.

step1.title: Discovery & Strategy
step1.description: We discuss your goals, scope, and deadlines to ensure alignment. I ask the right questions to understand your users and business needs deeply.

step2.title: Design & Concept
step2.description: I create initial high-fidelity drafts and wireframes for your approval. We iterate on the visual style until it perfectly matches your vision.

step3.title: Development
step3.description: The building phase where the approved design comes to life with clean, semantic code. I ensure everything is responsive and pixel-perfect.

step4.title: Review & Refine
step4.description: We test functionality across devices. You review the work, and I make necessary revisions to polish the final product.

step5.title: Launch & Support
step5.description: Final delivery and handoff of all assets. I assist with deployment and provide a period of post-launch support.

FAQ.title: Common Questions
FAQ.subtitle: Everything you need to know about the collaboration process.

q1.question: How do payments work?
q1.answer: For most projects on Upwork, we use the Escrow system. You fund milestones before I start, and funds are released only when you approve the work.

q2.question: What if I need revisions?
q2.answer: Each milestone typically includes 2 rounds of revisions. We will clarify expectations in the Discovery phase to minimize major changes later.

q3.question: How do we communicate?
q3.answer: Primary communication happens via Upwork Messages. For larger projects, we can schedule weekly Zoom calls to discuss progress.

q4.question: What is the typical timeline?
q4.answer: Timelines vary by complexity. A landing page might take 3-5 days, while a full website often takes 2-4 weeks. I'll provide a schedule in the brief.

Sidebar.helpBuild: I can help you build scalable applications just like this one.

1.title: Finly Analytics
1.description: A comprehensive financial dashboard for tracking real-time crypto assets and stock market trends using D3.js.
1.overview: This project involved a complete overhaul of a legacy financial tracking system. The goal was to transform a clunky, spreadsheet-based process into a modern, real-time web application. The new dashboard allows users to track assets, predict market trends, and generate reports instantly.

feedback.quote: Flynn delivered beyond expectations. The new dashboard is lightning fast and the code is pristine.
feedback.author: Client Name

0.title: Efficiency Boost
0.description: Reduce click-depth for common tasks by 60%, streamlining workflows.

1.title: Real-time Sync
1.description: Implement WebSocket updates for instant multi-user collaboration.

2.title: Mobile Accessibility
2.description: Full responsive design enabling access via tablets and phones.

0.title: Legacy Data Integration
0.description: The client's data was stored in an outdated SQL server with unstructured tables. Solution: Built a Node.js middleware adapter to cache and normalize data structure.

1.title: Complex Data Visualization
1.description: Displaying 10,000+ data points on a single chart was causing lag. Solution: Implemented data sampling and WebGL rendering using Recharts.

2.title: Sonic Stream
2.description: High-fidelity mobile application for music streaming with social sharing features.
2.overview: A seamless music streaming experience built for mobile. Focused on low-latency audio playback and social features like shared playlists.

3.title: Luxe Wear
3.description: Custom headless Shopify storefront built for a luxury fashion brand with optimized performance.
3.overview: A high-end e-commerce experience. We decoupled the frontend from Shopify to allow for complete design freedom and blazing fast page loads.

4.title: Orbit SaaS
4.description: Project management tool for remote teams featuring real-time collaboration.
4.overview: A comprehensive project management platform designed for remote-first teams. It integrates task tracking, real-time chat, and file sharing into a single interface to streamline workflows.

0.title: Unified Workflow
0.description: Combine communication and task management to reduce context switching.

1.title: Real-time Collaboration
1.description: Enable instant updates for task changes and comments using subscriptions.

0.title: State Management
0.description: Managing complex application state across multiple users. Solution: Used Vuex with optimistic UI updates.

feedback.quote: Orbit transformed how our remote team collaborates. The real-time features are a game changer.
feedback.author: Product Manager

5.title: MediConnect
5.description: Telemedicine platform connecting patients with specialists via secure video calls.
5.overview: A secure telemedicine platform that allows patients to book appointments and consult with doctors via video calls. Built with HIPAA compliance and accessibility in mind.

0.title: Accessibility
0.description: Make healthcare accessible to remote areas via simple web interface.

1.title: Security
1.description: Ensure end-to-end encryption for all patient data and video streams.

0.title: Video Quality
0.description: Ensuring stable video calls on low-bandwidth connections. Solution: implemented adaptive bitrate streaming.

feedback.quote: A robust platform that handled our patient load effortlessly. Security and ease of use are top-notch.
feedback.author: Clinic Director

6.title: API Gateway
6.description: High-performance backend infrastructure handling millions of requests for a social network.
6.overview: A high-performance API gateway serving as the entry point for a large-scale social network microservices architecture. Handles authentication, rate limiting, and routing.

0.title: High Throughput
0.description: Handle millions of concurrent requests with low latency.

1.title: Reliability
1.description: Ensure 99.99% uptime during peak traffic events.

0.title: Latency Spikes
0.description: Garbage collection pauses causing latency. Solution: Optimized memory allocation and tuned GC settings in Go.

feedback.quote: Our infrastructure reliability improved significantly. The gateway handles peak traffic without breaking a sweat.
feedback.author: CTO
